Course Materials

  • Advanced Algorithms by Ankur Moitra.
  • Advanced Algorithms by Sanjeev Arora.
  • Advances Algorithms by Jelani Nelson.
  • Advanced Data Structures by Erik Demaine.
  • Joan Burana's Stat212b course material to be covered.
